::DarkMouse::

Ignoring the pain from her burning paws, arms, torso and the rest of 
her that the flames touched, she tried to hurry up over the trees.  
She heard a noise behind her.  She saw the missles head right for 
her. She jumped just as the missles hit above her head.  SHe fell tot 
he ground, a huge gash in her shoulders, neck, part of the side of 
her head was damaged, her body was filled with shrapnel.  She lay on 
the ground, leaking mech fluid and shaking.  But slowly, her wounds 
started to heal.  In a few hours her wounds would be completely 
healed, and she would be in fighing order again.  But for now, her 
glowling mech fluid seeped out of the wounds and onto the ground. 

(No this isn't a mode.  Black Aracnia brought her back from the 
matrix. And instead of normal Mech fluid, it's mostly liquid energon 
that she has in her body.  Because of the energon, her body heals 
very quickly.)



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (Uh, Logo, that thing you're climbing over is on fire.)
> 
> Starscream weaved past one optic shot, but the other clipped hsi 
wing 
> and a trail of blac smoke started to come from it. He winced, but 
> than laughed.
> 
> All right mousey, he thought, I was only going to take you back to 
> KitKat and find out how much you know. But if you're going to play 
> rough, a dead mouse is as good as any.
> 
> Starscream's path was a little clearer now, and he could float 
across 
> the log. But he didn't need to. The bot was done enough to try and 
go 
> through the fire. All she needed was a little help.....
> 
> Starscream loaded another missle and locked it on.
> 
> "My first kill in the new body......"
> 
> Starscream fired the missle, heading straight for Darkmouse.
